div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

What will i do in 10 years time ? I'm certainly will not work anymore because at 65 years old , i'll hope to spend my time with my grandchildren . I also think to travel a little more , like visiting France or Italy where we have a lot of family . In France my son has a beautiful detached house with a swimming pool, near this property we can make a lot of walk into the fields.
The evening we can take nice aperitif with friends and read a lot of nice books.
And if it is not enough we may also take the airplane to Italy and see the family.
